abstract: With the acquisition, AT&T would gain five million new customers and acquire Leap’s network, licenses and retail stores, as well as the Cricket brand.
snippet: With the acquisition, AT&T would gain five million new customers and acquire Leap’s network, licenses and retail stores, as well as the Cricket brand.
lead_paragraph: 11:37 a.m. | Updated AT&T, thwarted by regulators nearly two years ago on a planned $39 billion acquisition of T-Mobile USA, is back in the merger hunt, albeit with a much smaller target.

headline.main: AT&T to Buy Leap Wireless for $1.2 Billion
headline.print_headline: At&t To Buy Leap Wireless International

byline.original: By William Alden and Michael J. de la Merced
